_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:54:04 using v2.1
title: What proportion of nurses leaves and joins the NHS ever month?
analysis_commentary: For nurses we do not see such extreme leaving rate peaks as for all staff groups and doctors. Instead, there are two joining rate peaks in the Fall of each year with 1.7% in September 2012 and 1.8% in September 2013. Twelve months moving averages show the same trend as for all staff.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, National Workforce Statistics
